title: Diary of a Surgical Resident: Madoka
overview: First-year medical resident Madoka struggles with adapting to new workplace reforms in the changing medical field. Luckily, her mentor is a cool and composed Dr. Sugano who holds life in high regard, and helps the other residents meet the constant trials of a two-year residency. Madoka finds comfort in her peers as she confronts the harsh tests of veteran doctors, the challenges of being a female doctor, and life decisions in this richly profound story of personal growth.
